headline: SPECTRUM BUSINESS LAUNCHES NEW FLEXIBLE PACKAGES AND FREE INTERNET SPEED LIFTS
summary: Spectrum kicked-off a series of enhancements today for its Spectrum Business customers, including new and simplified pricing and packages, faster internet for new business customers and free internet speed lifts for some current business customers. Additionally, the Company extended its market-leading Customer Commitment – the first in the industry to launch to residential customers last September – to its small business consumers. Spectrum's Commitment includes delivering reliability, transpare
